items.title: Rebecca Minkoff on the Power of Leveraging Your Name When Building a Brand
items.description: As a founder, you don’t need to become an influencer, but you do need to understand what your name stands for.

items.title: This 1 Number Explains Elon Musk—and Tesla’s—Biggest Problem
items.description: Tesla’s revenue is declining and it’s a sign that people aren’t buying its story anymore.

items.title: 3 Ways to Check That Your AI Hiring Bot Gets You the Best Candidates
items.description: Using AI can help hiring managers assess skills, but doubts over the technology’s accuracy call for some double-checking.

items.title: How HR Uses AI to Stay Human
items.description: A postcard from tomorrow’s workplace: how leaders balance technology and human connection.

items.title: How 2 Brothers With No Automotive Experience  Created a Scooter That Looks Like a Cybertruck
items.description: Infinite Machine’s P1 has a $10,000 price tag. Can it compete with the likes of Vespa?
